metadata.title: CVE-2016-2145 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The am_read_post_data function in mod_auth_mellon before 0.11.1 does notcheck if the ap_get_client_block function returns an error, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault andprocess crash) via a crafted POST data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.12.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.0-1').
